name: Stranded (itch) (notnullnotvoid)
description:
You’re the sole survivor of a plane crash on a remote island. You wake up on the coast, next to the flaming wreckage of your aircraft. Your goal is to find rescue, but just beyond the illumination of the flames, you see a glimmer of dread. To explore the island and survive the forest inland, you must Keep Your Flame Alive – lest you don’t keep yourself alive.

  • Carry a torch to light the way forward
  • Find an axe to chop down trees
  • Build and maintain bonfires so you have a place to rest
  • Explore the map so you can find a way to escape the island and win the game!

Controls: WASD + Left click + Right click
